pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains no nudity or similar sexually explicit content. 
However, this game contains depictions of non-consensual bondage and kidnapping. There is frequent bondage imagery throughout the game, albeit of the relatively mild variety.
